channel.title: Arkady Severny on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Arkady Severny on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian Smoking Songs and Cigarette Music
item.description: And also about not smoking, but that’s only at the end. Pack of Cigarettes: Пачка сигарет From Kino’s Viktor Tsoj (Виктор Цой), the first big hit for Russian smoking songs. From 1989, from Звезда по имени Солнце (Star Named Sun).
